utterance: Oana Luca: And if I may add to that, one of the things that we've learned recently in some of our work is that if one were to try to run your electrolysis for a long time, we also observe these thermal effects that are localized around the places of maximum resistance in our reactors. And also you know if you look at the current chemical industry how people really doing these kind of process design usually they produce multiple products and they do the separation process and then separate out and they sell them separately or they integrate into a downstream process trying to make a high value chemicals.
